events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like a refund. The product does not match what I originally purchased.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the incorrect product delivered to the customer.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case reported by the customer.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and would like to resolve this promptly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is the order number 123456789 and attached is the photo showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a refund immediately and provide a prepaid shipping label for the return.
Great, I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to handle the refund and return process.
We have processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to confirm your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further response, we will close the case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We would appreciate it if you took a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey related to your refund experience.
